Summary: There was one large one and around 8 smaller ones scattered around in same area, they looked like they were reflecting a glare off the sun
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were leaving the m62 to go on to the m1 southbound from Bradford to Sheffield when we noticed a couple of hovering shiny objects when we got to the brow of the hill we noticed around 9 in total one was larger than the rest and there was one very small round one that was omitting a white light and was higher than all the others, after around 10 to 15 mins all but two disappeared then the remaining two followed
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Leeds
There were no other sightings in Leeds on or around October 24th 2013
